result.deployment_manifest:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: thousandrealitiesapp-tcp
  labels:
    run: thousandrealitiesapp
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: tcp8889
    protocol: TCP
    port: 8889
    targetPort: 8889
  - name: tcp8890
    protocol: TCP
    port: 8890
    targetPort: 8890
  selector:
    run: thousandrealitiesapp
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: thousandrealitiesapp-udp
  labels:
    run: thousandrealitiesapp
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: udp8888
    protocol: UDP
    port: 8888
    targetPort: 8888
  selector:
    run: thousandrealitiesapp
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: thousandrealitiesapp-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: thousandrealitiesapp
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: thousandrealitiesapp
    spec:
      volumes:
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: mexregistrysecret
      containers:
      - name: thousandrealitiesapp
        image: registry.mobiledgex.net:5000/1000realities/1000realitiesapp
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 8889
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8890
          protocol: TCP

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: demo2-tcp
  labels:
    run: demo2
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: tcp7778
    protocol: TCP
    port: 7778
    targetPort: 7778
  selector:
    run: demo2
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: demo2-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: demo2
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: demo2
    spec:
      volumes:
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: mexregistrysecret
      containers:
      - name: demo2
        image: registry.mobiledgex.net:5000/mobiledgex/simapp
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7778
          protocol: TCP
        command:
        - "simapp"
        - "-port"
        - "7778"

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: facedetectiondemo-tcp
  labels:
    run: facedetectiondemo
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: tcp8008
    protocol: TCP
    port: 8008
    targetPort: 8008
  selector:
    run: facedetectiondemo
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: facedetectiondemo-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: facedetectiondemo
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: facedetectiondemo
    spec:
      volumes:
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: mexregistrysecret
      containers:
      - name: facedetectiondemo
        image: registry.mobiledgex.net:5000/mobiledgex/facedetection
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8008
          protocol: TCP

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: mobiledgexsdkdemo-tcp
  labels:
    run: mobiledgexsdkdemo
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - port: 7777
    targetPort: 7777
    protocol: TCP
    name: http
  selector:
    run: mobiledgexsdkdemo
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mobiledgexsdkdemo-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: mobiledgexsdkdemo
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: mobiledgexsdkdemo
    spec:
      volumes:
      imagePullSecrets: 
      - name: mexregistrysecret
      containers:
      - name: mobiledgexsdkdemo
        image: registry.mobiledgex.net:5000/mobiledgex/simapp
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7777
        command:
         - "simapp"
         - "-port"
         - "7777"

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: arb-edgex-tcp
  labels:
    run: arb-edgex
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: tcp6660
    protocol: TCP
    port: 6660
    targetPort: 6660
  - name: tcp6661
    protocol: TCP
    port: 6661
    targetPort: 6661
  - name: tcp6662
    protocol: TCP
    port: 6662
    targetPort: 6662
  - name: tcp6663
    protocol: TCP
    port: 6663
    targetPort: 6663
  - name: tcp6664
    protocol: TCP
    port: 6664
    targetPort: 6664
  - name: tcp6665
    protocol: TCP
    port: 6665
    targetPort: 6665
  selector:
    run: arb-edgex
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: arb-edgex-udp
  labels:
    run: arb-edgex
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: udp6666
    protocol: UDP
    port: 6666
    targetPort: 6666
  - name: udp6667
    protocol: UDP
    port: 6667
    targetPort: 6667
  - name: udp6668
    protocol: UDP
    port: 6668
    targetPort: 6668
  - name: udp6669
    protocol: UDP
    port: 6669
    targetPort: 6669
  - name: udp6670
    protocol: UDP
    port: 6670
    targetPort: 6670
  - name: udp6671
    protocol: UDP
    port: 6671
    targetPort: 6671
  selector:
    run: arb-edgex
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: arb-edgex-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: arb-edgex
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: arb-edgex
    spec:
      volumes:
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: mexregistrysecret
      containers:
      - name: arb-edgex
        image: registry.mobiledgex.net:5000/niantic/arb-edgex
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6660
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6661
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6662
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6663
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6664
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6665
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6666
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 6667
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 6668
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 6669
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 6670
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 6671
          protocol: UDP
